AttributeReleasePolicy.Description: This file contains the custom Attribute Release Policies for the Home Organization 'aaitest.switch.ch'. If you want to set additional rules to further restrict the release of certain attributes to specific Home Organizations, download and install the updateARP tool (https://aai-rr.switch.ch/dev/download.php/updateARP.tgz).
AttributeReleasePolicy.Rule:
This the Resource used in the AAI Demo. It basically shows all attributes available and also demonstrates the lazy session feature.
https://kohala.switch.ch/shibboleth

<Attribute name="urn:mace:switch.ch:attribute-def:swissEduPersonGender" release="permit"
<AnyValue release="permit"
